Name: Trio
About the game: 2D plaformer with hardcore levels. Play as one of three heroes with different abilities. Complete levels by helping each other. Enjoy minimalistic graphics and fantastic music. Do you dare to complete all levels? 35 levels 678 achievements 7 fantastic music track 1-6 level - 6 achievements each 7-10 level - 12 achievements each 11-35 level - 24 achievements each ATTENTION All completed achievements will be added after you close the game.
